ids_info.name: operational_instrumentation
ids_info.description: Diagnostics measuring mechanical displacement, acceleration or strains on various parts of the device

operational_instrumentation/sensor/type/.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

operational_instrumentation/sensor/attac.documentation: IMAS URI of the system(s) to which this sensor is attached. Two for displacement sensors, one for the other types of sensors
Attachement point(s) of the sensor. Two for displacement sensors, one for the other types of sensors

operational_instrumentation/sensor/direc.documentation: Second direction of measurement, in case of a rosette straing gauge

operational_instrumentation/sensor/lengt.documentation: Length measured by a displacement sensor

operational_instrumentation/sensor/accel.documentation: Acceleration measured by an accelerometer sensor

operational_instrumentation/sensor/strai.documentation: Strain measured by a strain gauge

Strain measured by a rosette strain gauge. The first dimension lists the components of the strain tensor : Sx1x1, Sx1x2, Sx2x2, where x1 is the main direction and x2 is the second direction of measurement.

operational_instrumentation/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network.
